synonyms: keśava-bhede—according to the different opinion about Lord Keśava; padma—lotus; śaṅkha—conch; gadā—club; cakra—and disc; dhara—holding; mādhava-bhede—according to the different opinion about the bodily features of Lord Mādhava; cakra—disc; gadā—club; śaṅkha—conch; padma—lotus; kara—in the hands.
translation: "Keśava is described differently as holding the lotus, conch, club and disc, and Mādhava is described as holding disc, club, conch and lotus in His hands.
